name: Sweet Dragon Shooter Pop
description:
Super hit game Sweet Dragon Shooter Pop now comes!
Cute dinosaurs have been stuck on bubbles! You need to shoot bubbles, keep rescuing dinosaur babies and drop your way to victory!

Features:
- 500+ levels of Challenging Puzzles!
- Adventure across a stunning world.
- Score Big Bonuses - beat your friends’ scores!
- Power Up with magic boost!
